data.name: I_havent_been_able_to_sleep_quite_the_same_since
data.value: I haven't been able to sleep quite the same since.

data.name: Now_Ryan_I_know_weve_been_avoiding_this_subject_for_a_while_but
data.value: Now, Ryan, I know we've been avoiding this subject for a while, but...

data.name: I_know_I_know_We_should_talk_about_him_We_should
data.value: I know, I know. We should talk about him. We should.

data.name: Im_glad_you_think_so_too_We_can_start_simple_How_have_things_been_since_the_diagnosis
data.value: I'm glad you think so too. We can start simple. How have things been since the diagnosis?

data.name: Oh_I_dont_know_Odd_I_guess_I_just_dont_know_if_I_believe_it
data.value: Oh, I don't know... Odd, I guess. I just don't know if I believe it.

data.name: Aspergers_can_present_itself_in_many_different_ways_Ryan
data.value: Asperger's can present itself in many different ways, Ryan.

data.name: Sure_I_know_it_can_its_just_youve_heard_the_way_I_describe_him_Does_it_sound_like_Aspergers_to_you
data.value: Sure, I know it can, it's just... you've heard the way I describe him. Does it sound like Asperger's to you?

data.name: Well_his_antisocial_behavior_certainly_could_be_a_sign_Youve_told_me_he_has_lots_of_trouble_making_friends
data.value: Well, his anti-social behavior certainly could be a sign. You've told me he has lots of trouble making friends.

data.name: Yeah_he_does_At_least_I_think_he_does_He_never_brings_anybody_home_anyways_Do_you_think_hell_ever_get_any_better_about_that
data.value: Yeah, he does. At least, I think he does. He never brings anybody home, anyways. Do you think he'll ever get any better about that?

data.name: Its_possible_Perhaps_the_antidepressants_will_help_with_that_as_well
data.value: It's possible. Perhaps the antidepressants will help with that as well.

data.name: Many_depressed_people_feel_that_socializing_just_isnt_worth_it_whether_theyre_on_the_spectrum_or_not
data.value: Many depressed people feel that socializing just isn't worth it, whether they're on the spectrum or not.

data.name: You_ought_to_know_that
data.value: You ought to know that.

data.name: Thats_true_I_dont_know_I_just_cant_shake_the_feeling_that_Im_Im_missing_something_Something_big_about_his_behavior
data.value: That's true. I don't know, I just can't shake the feeling that I'm... I'm missing something? Something big about his behavior.

data.name: And_its_not_that_I_dont_trust_well_your_people_but_if_his_own_father_doesnt_know_him_how_can_a_psychiatrist
data.value: And it's not that I don't trust... well, your people, but if his own father doesn't know him, how can a psychiatrist?

data.name: You_may_be_right_Ryan_But_for_the_time_being_the_diagnosis_should_be_a_good_thing
data.value: You may be right, Ryan. But for the time being, the diagnosis should be a good thing.

data.name: Its_your_first_step_to_getting_Landon_help_Dont_you_think_so
data.value: It's your first step to getting Landon help. Don't you think so?

data.name: Of_course_I_just_want_whats_best_for_my_son
data.value: Of course. I just want what's best for my son.

data.name: I_really_dont_think_hes_sick_Not_like_that
data.value: I really don't think he's sick. Not like that.

data.name: I_think_Im_afraid_of_him
data.value: I think I'm afraid of him.

data.name: Ive_always_wanted_whats_best_for_Landon
data.value: I've always wanted what's best for Landon.

data.name: Im_not_100_convinced_thats_changing_schools_pumping_him_with_pills_and_starting_all_over_but_if_thats_what_his_mother_and_his_psychiatrist_are_saying_I_guess_thats_for_the_best
data.value: I'm not 100% convinced that's changing schools, pumping him with pills, and starting all over, but if that's what his mother and his psychiatrist are saying, I guess that's for the best.

data.name: Its_good_that_you_have_his_best_interests_at_heart
data.value: It's good that you have his best interests at heart.

data.name: I_know_that_as_a_parent_with_mental_illness_it_can_be_difficult_to_handle_when_your_child_is_also_diagnosed
data.value: I know that, as a parent with mental illness, it can be difficult to handle when your child is also diagnosed.

data.name: Its_hard_not_to_feel_guilty_you_know_Like_maybe_if_Id_done_something_differently
data.value: It's hard not to feel guilty, you know? Like, maybe if I'd done something differently...

data.name: Mental_illness_is_like_any_other_chronic_disease_You_cant_have_done_anything_to_prevent_it
data.value: Mental illness is like any other chronic disease. You can't have done anything to prevent it.

data.name: Okay_but_maybe_if_Id_been_around_more_often_or_spent_more_time_with_him
data.value: Okay, but maybe if I'd been around more often, or spent more time with him.

data.name: Im_always_off_at_work_and_his_mother_isnt_the_most_accessible_of_people
data.value: I'm always off at work, and his mother isn't the most accessible of people.

data.name: Maybe_if_Id_been_there_he_wouldnt_be_having_such_a_rough_time
data.value: Maybe if I'd been there, he wouldn't be having such a rough time.

data.name: Maybe_but_that_doesnt_mean_youve_lost_everything_Ryan_You_can_still_make_time_for_him_now
data.value: Maybe, but that doesn't mean you've lost everything, Ryan. You can still make time for him now.

data.name: What_if_its_too_late_Hes_so_attached_to_his_mother_now_He_barely_speaks_to_me
data.value: What if it's too late? He's so attached to his mother now. He barely speaks to me.

data.name: Ive_tried_reaching_out_to_him_a_few_times_but_he_always_goes_off_and_hides_in_his_room_to_play_on_his_computer_or_whatever_it_is_he_does_up_there
data.value: I've tried reaching out to him a few times, but he always goes off and hides in his room to play on his computer or whatever it is he does up there.

data.name: He_isnt_interested_in_bonding
data.value: He isn't interested in bonding.

data.name: Teenagers_are_difficult_mentally_ill_or_not_Youve_got_to_try_Ryan_For_your_family_You_know_how_important_it_is
data.value: Teenagers are difficult, mentally ill or not. You've got to try, Ryan. For your family. You know how important it is.

data.name: He_wouldnt_even_tell_me_what_those_bullies_were_doing_to_him_at_school_Or_who_they_were_He_just_said_he_needed_to_get_away_from_them
data.value: He wouldn't even tell me what those bullies were doing to him at school. Or who they were. He just said he needed to get away from them.

data.name: I_still_dont_know_why_why_he_did_what_he_did
data.value: I still don't know why... why he did what he did.

data.name: To_the_bullies
data.value: To the bullies?

data.name: Yes_Like_to_purposefully_hurt_somebody_the_way_he_did_that_one_kid_the_kid_had_to_have_done_something_pretty_awful_to_him
data.value: Yes. Like, to purposefully hurt somebody the way he did that one kid... the kid had to have done something pretty awful to him.

data.name: How_bad_were_his_injuries_exactly
data.value: How bad were his injuries, exactly?

data.name: Hes_just_getting_out_of_the_hospital_today_They_thought_he_might_have_needed_plastic_surgery_for_his_face
data.value: He's just getting out of the hospital today. They thought he might have needed plastic surgery for his face.

data.name: And_Landon_still_hasnt_said_a_thing_Just_that_he_had_it_coming_He_didnt_even_seem_sorry_about_it
data.value: And Landon still hasn't said a thing. Just that he had it coming. He didn't even seem sorry about it.

data.name: Well_its_difficult_to_talk_about_the_people_that_have_hurt_us_especially_for_a_teenager
data.value: Well... it's difficult to talk about the people that have hurt us, especially for a teenager.

data.name: If_you_really_want_to_connect_youll_just_need_to_try_harder_to_reach_out_Maybe_hed_like_a_trip_to_the_movies_Or_the_park
data.value: If you really want to connect, you'll just need to try harder to reach out. Maybe he'd like a trip to the movies? Or the park?

data.name: Maybe_Who_knows_what_he_likes_anymore
data.value: Maybe... Who knows what he likes anymore.

data.name: Landon_has_always_been_troubled_as_long_as_I_can_remember
data.value: Landon has always been troubled, as long as I can remember.

data.name: What_do_you_mean_by_troubled
data.value: What do you mean by "troubled"?

data.name: I_mean_hes_always_been_difficult_to_reach_Even_when_he_was_a_baby
data.value: I mean... he's always been difficult to reach. Even when he was a baby.

data.name: All_he_did_was_stare_Stare_or_cry_when_he_was_hungry_It_was_unnerving
data.value: All he did was stare. Stare or cry when he was hungry. It was unnerving.

data.name: You_mean_to_say_he_was_slow_to_show_emotion
data.value: You mean to say he was slow to show emotion?

data.name: Well_yes_but_it_was_more_than_that_I_mean_theres_something_from_when_he_was_younger_and_at_the_time_I_thought_maybe_I_was_imagining_it_but_now
data.value: Well, yes, but it was more than that I mean, there's something, from when he was younger, and at the time I thought maybe I was imagining it, but now...

data.name: What_are_you_talking_about
data.value: What are you talking about?

data.name: I_was_the_first_one_to_ever_see_him_smile
data.value: I was the first one to ever see him smile.

data.name: Well_thats_wonderful
data.value: Well, that's wonderful.

data.name: No_no_it_wasnt_wonderful_It_was_unsettling
data.value: No, no, it wasn't wonderful. It was... unsettling.

data.name: Most_babies_their_first_smile_happens_because_they_hear_their_mothers_voice_or_somebody_makes_a_silly_face_at_them
data.value: Most babies, their first smile happens because they hear their mother's voice, or somebody makes a silly face at them.

data.name: Not_Landon
data.value: Not Landon.

data.name: What_was_it_for_Landon
data.value: What was it for Landon?

data.name: Cynthia_was_just_out_getting_the_mail_when_it_happened_I_was_in_the_kitchen_getting_breakfast_ready_I_was_going_to_make_pancakes
data.value: Cynthia was just out getting the mail when it happened. I was in the kitchen, getting breakfast ready. I was going to make pancakes.

data.name: Anyways_I_opened_up_one_of_the_cabinets_higher_up_trying_to_find_a_good_frying_pan
data.value: Anyways, I opened up one of the cabinets higher up, trying to find a good frying pan.

data.name: I_couldnt_quite_reach_the_pan_I_wanted_so_I_set_Landon_down_on_the_counter_for_just_a_minute_and_reached_up
data.value: I couldn't quite reach the pan I wanted, so I set Landon down on the counter for just a minute and reached up.

data.name: The_pan_came_crashing_down_right_next_to_Landon_I_panicked_and_threw_my_hand_out
data.value: The pan came crashing down, right next to Landon. I panicked and threw my hand out.

data.name: I_hit_the_pan_out_of_the_way_in_time_but_not_before_it_broke_two_of_my_fingers
data.value: I hit the pan out of the way in time, but not before it broke two of my fingers.

data.name: It_made_the_most_awful_sound
data.value: It made the most awful sound.

data.name: And_Landon_cried
data.value: And Landon cried?

data.name: No_no_thats_just_it_Most_babies_would_have_started_screaming_the_second_the_loud_sounds_started_But_not_Landon
data.value: No, no, that's just it. Most babies would have started screaming the second the loud sounds started. But not Landon.

data.name: He_was_making_a_funny_sound_and_fidgeting_a_little_bit_and_for_a_second_I_thought_maybe_hed_somehow_been_hurt_or_was_getting_ready_to_cry_but_no
data.value: He was making a funny sound and fidgeting a little bit, and for a second I thought maybe he'd somehow been hurt or was getting ready to cry, but no.

data.name: He_was_giggling_It_was_the_first_time_Id_ever_seen_him_smile_or_laugh_And_he_just_kept_going
data.value: He was giggling. It was the first time I'd ever seen him smile, or laugh. And he just kept going.

data.name: Im_standing_there_screaming_in_pain_and_hes_laughing_He_thought_it_was_hilarious
data.value: I'm standing there, screaming in pain, and he's laughing. He thought it was hilarious.

data.name: Maybe_you_were_making_a_funny_face
data.value: Maybe you were making a funny face?

data.name: Thats_what_Cynthia_thought_when_I_told_her_but_I_dont_think_thats_it_I_think_he_genuinely_liked_it
data.value: That's what Cynthia thought when I told her, but I don't think that's it. I think he genuinely liked it.

data.name: The_loud_noises
data.value: The loud noises?

data.name: The_screaming_The_pain_Sometimes_I_wonder_if_he_still_does
data.value: The screaming. The pain. Sometimes I wonder if he still does.

data.name: That_psychiatrist_hes_seeing_doesnt_know_Landon_like_I_do_He_hasnt_seen_what_Ive_seen_him_doing
data.value: That psychiatrist he's seeing doesn't know Landon like I do. He hasn't seen what I've seen him doing.

data.name: What_did_you_see
data.value: What did you see?

data.name: Its_hard_to_explain_And_Im_not_really_proud_of_how_I_found_it
data.value: It's... hard to explain. And I'm not really proud of how I found it.

data.name: Found_what_Ryan
data.value: Found what, Ryan?

data.name: I_You_have_to_understand_that_he_never_talks_to_me_And_after_everything_thats_happened_with_the_bullying_and_the_switching_schools_and_the_secrets
data.value: I... You have to understand that he never talks to me. And after everything that's happened, with the bullying and the switching schools and the secrets...

data.name: I_just_wanted_to_understand
data.value: I just wanted to understand.

data.name: See_pretty_much_every_weekend_when_he_thinks_nobody_is_looking_Landon_goes_off_into_the_belt_of_forest_behind_our_home_and_doesnt_come_back_for_a_couple_of_hours
data.value: See, pretty much every weekend, when he thinks nobody is looking, Landon goes off into the belt of forest behind our home, and doesn't come back for a couple of hours.

data.name: I_had_no_idea_what_he_was_doing_back_there_I_thought_maybe_he_was_meeting_a_girl_or_maybe_doing_drugs_with_some_friends_I_didnt_know_about
data.value: I had no idea what he was doing back there. I thought maybe he was meeting a girl, or maybe doing drugs with some friends I didn't know about.

data.name: I_dont_know_that_I_really_would_have_minded_if_that_was_what_he_was_doing_back_there_because_at_least_that_would_mean_hes_spending_time_with_someone
data.value: I don't know that I really would have minded if that was what he was doing back there, because at least that would mean he's spending time with someone.

data.name: But_its_the_kind_of_thing_I_think_a_father_should_know_about
data.value: But it's the kind of thing I think a father should know about.

data.name: Sure
data.value: Sure.

data.name: So_one_Saturday_afternoon_I_decided_to_follow_after_him_I_waited_until_he_left_the_house_and_scaled_over_the_back_fence_and_then_I_went
data.value: So, one Saturday afternoon, I decided to follow after him. I waited until he left the house and scaled over the back fence, and then I went.

data.name: He_walked_for_about_twenty_minutes_back_into_the_forest_and_then_he_stopped_at_this_little_clearing_in_the_trees
data.value: He walked for about twenty minutes back into the forest, and then he stopped at this little clearing in the trees.

data.name: I_hid_behind_one_of_the_big_oaks_while_he_bent_down_over_something
data.value: I hid behind one of the big oaks while he bent down over something.

data.name: He_wasnt_meeting_anybody_after_all_He_just_seemed_to_be_working_away_at_something_like_he_was_really_focused
data.value: He wasn't meeting anybody after all. He just seemed to be working away at something, like he was really focused.

data.name: I_felt_bad_watching_him_but_I_also_didnt_want_to_interrupt_So_I_just_watched
data.value: I felt bad watching him, but I also didn't want to interrupt. So I just watched.

data.name: And_then
data.value: And then?

data.name: After_a_while_he_seemed_to_get_bored_He_got_up_and_left_After_I_was_sure_he_wasnt_going_to_come_back_I_got_up_so_I_could_get_a_closer_look_at_his_project
data.value: After a while, he seemed to get bored. He got up and left. After I was sure he wasn't going to come back, I got up so I could get a closer look at his project.

data.name: From_far_away_it_looked_like_like_maybe_dolls_or_something__Like_he_was_playing_with_dolls_or_stuffed_animals
data.value: From far away, it looked like... like maybe dolls, or something? Like he was playing with dolls, or stuffed animals?

data.name: But_then
data.value: But then...

data.name: then_I_got_closer_and
data.value: ...then I got closer, and...

data.name: and_I_realized
data.value: ...and I realized...

data.name: They_werent_dolls
data.value: They weren't dolls?

data.name: No_Not_dolls_Animals_Corpses_Bloody_open_bodies_of_squirrels_and_rabbits_baking_in_the_sun_I_almost_threw_up
data.value: No. Not dolls. Animals. Corpses. Bloody, open bodies of squirrels and rabbits, baking in the sun... I almost threw up.

data.name: But_what_was_he_doing_with_them
data.value: But what was he doing with them?

data.name: I_couldnt_tell_you_He_had_a_bunch_of_sticks_and_sharpened_rocks_around_and_hed_pulled_the_guts_out_of_some_of_the_poor_little_creatures
data.value: I couldn't tell you. He had a bunch of sticks and sharpened rocks around, and he'd pulled the guts out of some of the poor little creatures.

data.name: It_was_like_he_was_examining_them_Playing_surgeon
data.value: It was like he was examining them. Playing surgeon.

data.name: Ryan_I_cant_lie_to_you_Thats_thats_concerning_behavior_Is_he_still_doing_that
data.value: Ryan, I can't lie to you. That's... that's concerning behavior. Is he still doing that?

data.name: I_think_thats_the_most_disturbing_part_about_all_of_this_for_me_strangely_enough
data.value: I think that's the most disturbing part about all of this for me, strangely enough.

data.name: He_stopped_That_same_day_that_I_went_after_him_he_quit_going_out_on_the_weekends
data.value: He stopped. That same day that I went after him, he quit going out on the weekends.

data.name: Started_staying_at_home_in_his_room_like_he_does_mosts_school_nights
data.value: Started staying at home in his room, like he does most school nights.

data.name: Its_like_he_knew_hed_been_followed
data.value: It's like he knew he'd been followed.

data.name: Perhaps_Cynthia_told_him
data.value: Perhaps Cynthia told him?

data.name: Maybe_but_I_dont_think_so_I_dont_think_she_knew_Id_gone_out
data.value: Maybe, but I don't think so. I don't think she knew I'd gone out.

data.name: But_he_never_said_anything_to_you_about_it
data.value: But he never said anything to you about it?

data.name: No_never
data.value: No, never.

data.name: And_to_be_honest_with_you
data.value: And, to be honest with you...
